parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="advcellp_lineitem">
<attribute name="advcellp_lineitemid"/>
<attribute name="advcellp_newcolumn"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="advcellp_newcolumn" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="advcellp_project" operator="eq" uiname="cellpack no 1" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="advcellp_externalresource">
<attribute name="advcellp_externalresourceid"/>
<attribute name="advcellp_newcolumn"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="advcellp_newcolumn" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="advcellp_project" operator="eq" uiname="Autonomous Battery Testing Pilot" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="advcellp_workpackage">
<attribute name="advcellp_workpackageid"/>
<attribute name="advcellp_workpackagename"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="advcellp_workpackagename" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="advcellp_project" operator="eq" uiname="Autonomous Battery Testing Pilot" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="msdyn_projecttask">
<attribute name="msdyn_subject"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<attribute name="msdyn_projecttaskid"/>
<order attribute="msdyn_subject" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="msdyn_project" operator="eq" uiname="cellpack no 1" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statuscode" operator="eq" value="1"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="msdyn_projectrisk">
<attribute name="msdyn_projectriskid"/>
<attribute name="msdyn_name"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="msdyn_name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="msdyn_project" operator="eq" uiname="Autonomous Battery Testing Pilot" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="msdyn_projectissue">
<attribute name="msdyn_projectissueid"/>
<attribute name="msdyn_name"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="msdyn_name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="msdyn_project" operator="eq" uiname="cellpack no 1" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="msdyn_projectstatusreport">
<attribute name="msdyn_projectstatusreportid"/>
<attribute name="msdyn_name"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="msdyn_name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="msdyn_project" operator="eq" uiname="cellpack no 1" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
<entity name="msdyn_projectchange">
<attribute name="msdyn_projectchangeid"/>
<attribute name="msdyn_name"/>
<attribute name="createdon"/>
<order attribute="msdyn_name" descending="false"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="msdyn_project" operator="eq" uiname="dfgds" uitype="msdyn_project" value="@{triggerBody()['text']}"/>
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

parameters.item/Title: Error in advcellp_Child Set Approval Stage Field On Related Entity
parameters.item/PowerAutomateorJavascriptName: advcellp_Child Set Approval Stage Field On Related Entity
parameters.item/ErrorMessage: Child automate to update the status of stage field
parameters.item/OtherInformation: Child automate to update the status of stage field
